title: Virtual Desktop Service
description: Enables Windows and Linux virtual machines to be accessed via Apache Guacamole.

is_exposed_externally.title: Expose externally
is_exposed_externally.description: Is the Guacamole service exposed outside of the vnet

openid_authorization_endpoint.title: OpenID authorization endpoint
openid_authorization_endpoint.description: The authorization endpoint (URI) of the OpenID service.

openid_jwks_endpoint.title: OpenID JWKS endpoint
openid_jwks_endpoint.description: The endpoint (URI) of the JWKS service which defines how received ID tokens (JSON Web Tokens or JWTs) shall be validated

openid_issuer.title: OpenID issuer
openid_issuer.description: The issuer to expect for all received ID tokens

openid_client_id.title: OpenID client id
openid_client_id.description: The OpenID client ID which should be submitted to the OpenID service when necessary. This value is typically provided to you by the OpenID service when OpenID credentials are generated for your application.
